displayName.english: Prelude to the Sea of Souls

description.english: Clear the game without taking damage
Clear the game with Fire, Water, Grass, Ice, and Light class Buffs
description.schinese: 通关时拥有火、水、草、冰、光五种流派Buff
description.tchinese: 通关时拥有火、水、草、冰、光五种流派Buff

description.english: Clear the game with Flygrass, Koi, and Golden Crow simultaneously
description.schinese: 通关时同时拥有蝇草、锦鲤、金乌
description.tchinese: 通关时同时拥有蝇草、锦鲤、金乌

description.english: Clear the game with a body length of 0
Kill 20 enemies within 3 seconds of elemental elimination
description.schinese: 元素消除3秒内击杀20个敌人

description.english: Kill 40 enemies within 3 seconds of elemental elimination
description.schinese: 元素消除3秒内击杀40个敌人
同时拥有10个以上召唤物

累計使用十次強化代幣

description.english: 100 Thorns exist on the map simultaneously

description.tchinese: 地圖上同時存在100個荊棘

description.tchinese: 連續釋放6種不同的技能（水，火，草，冰，光，脈冲）

Lily clears the game with fully enhanced Golden Crow class buffs

description.tchinese: 許夢萱通關時擁有全部滿強化金乌流派buff

description.tchinese: 巴闕通關時擁有全部滿強化錦鯉流派buff

description.tchinese: 潮音通關時遊戲音量為0

description.english: Maintain a body length of 0 for 10 seconds
